function.description: Returns the cosine of an angle of x radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/cos/]
Returns the cosine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/cos/]
Returns the sine of an angle of x radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/sin/]
Returns the sine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/sin/]
Returns the tangent of an angle of x radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/tan/]
Returns the tangent of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/tan/]
Returns the principal value of the arc cosine of x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/acos/]
Returns the arc cosine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/acos/]
Returns the principal value of the arc sine of x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/asin/]
Returns the arc sine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/asin/]
Returns the principal value of the arc tangent of x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/atan/]
Returns the arc tangent of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/atan/]
Returns the principal value of the arc tangent of y/x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/atan2/]
function.prototype: <float T> public T atan2(T y, T x)

function.description: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/cosh/]
Returns the hyperbolic cosine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/cosh/]
Returns the hyperbolic sine of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/sinh/]
Returns the hyperbolic sine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/sinh/]
Returns the hyperbolic tangent of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/tanh/]
Returns the hyperbolic tangent of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/tanh/]
Returns the nonnegative area hyperbolic cosine of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/acosh/]
Returns the arc hyperbolic cosine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/acosh/]
Returns the arc hyperbolic sine of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/asinh/]
Returns the arc hyperbolic sine of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/asinh/]
Returns the area hyperbolic tangent of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/atanh/]
Returns the arc hyperbolic tangent of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/atanh/]
Returns the base-e exponential function of x, which is e raised to the power x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/exp/]
Returns the base-e exponential of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/exp/]
Returns the base-2 exponential function of x, which is 2 raised to the power x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/exp2/]
Returns the natural logarithm of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/log/]

Returns the natural (base-e) logarithm of the complex number x, using the principal branch, whose cuts are along the negative real axis. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/log/]
Returns the common (base-10) logarithm of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/log10/]

Returns the common (base-10) logarithm of the complex number x using the principal branch, whose cuts are along the negative real axis. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/log10/]
Returns the binary (base-2) logarithm of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/log2/]
Returns the square root of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/sqrt/]
Returns the square root of x using the principal branch, whose cuts are along the negative real axis. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/sqrt/]
Returns the cubic root of x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/cbrt/]
Returns the hypotenuse of a right-angled triangle whose legs are x and y. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/hypot/]
function.prototype: <float T> public T hypot(T x, T y)

function.description: Returns the error function value for x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/erf/]
Returns the complementary error function value for x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/erfc/]
Rounds x toward zero, returning the nearest integral value that is not larger in magnitude than x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/trunc/]
Returns x\*y+z. The function computes the result without losing precision in any intermediate result. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/cmath/fma/]
function.prototype: <float T> public T fma(T x, T y, T z)

function.description: Returns the phase angle (or angular component) of the complex number x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/arg/]
Returns the phase angle (or angular component) of the complex number x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/arg/]
Returns the norm value of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/norm/]
Returns the norm value of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/norm/]
Returns the conjugate of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/conj/]

Returns a complex object (in cartesian format) corresponding to the complex number defined by its polar components rho and theta. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/polar/]
function.prototype: public complex64 polar(float64 rho, float64 theta)

function.description: Returns a complex object (in cartesian format) corresponding to the complex number defined by its polar components rho and theta. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/polar/]
function.prototype: public complex32 polar(float32 rho, float32 theta)

function.description: Returns the projection of the complex number x onto the Riemann sphere. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/proj/]
